name: REFERRAL_ADDL_PROV
description: This table contains Additional providers (besides the referring and referred-to provider) who are associated with this referral.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID of the referral record in the database.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the multiple responses.

columns.name: ADDL_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.
